trans-unit.source: Specifies a range of character positions within a string.
trans-unit.target: 指定字符串内字符位置的范围。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange> and use it to highlight part of a string.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange>并使用它来突出显示字符串的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: 本示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Paste the example into a form and call the `HighlightACharacterRange` method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 将示例粘贴到窗体并调用`HighlightACharacterRange`方法时处理该窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件，并传递`e`作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: The position of the first character in the range.
trans-unit.target: 此范围内第一个字符的位置。

trans-unit.source: For example, if <c>First</c> is set to 0, the first position of the range is position 0 in the string.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果第一个设置为 0，那么此范围的第一个位置是字符串中的位置 0<c></c>。

trans-unit.source: The number of positions in the range.
trans-unit.target: 此范围内的位置数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.CharacterRange" /> structure, specifying a range of character positions within a string.
trans-unit.target: 指定字符串内字符位置的范围，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.CharacterRange" /> 结构的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange> and use it to highlight part of a string.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange>并使用它来突出显示字符串的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: 本示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Paste the example into a form and call the `HighlightACharacterRange` method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 将示例粘贴到窗体并调用`HighlightACharacterRange`方法时处理该窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件，并传递`e`作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to for equality.
trans-unit.target: 要进行等效性比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this object is equivalent to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 获取指示此对象是否与指定对象等效的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate the specified object is an instance with the same <see cref="P:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.First" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.Length" /> value as this instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定对象是与此实例具有相同的 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.First" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.Length" /> 值的实例，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.op_Equality%2A> to test for equality.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.op_Equality%2A>来测试相等性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.Equals%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴到 Windows 窗体中。

trans-unit.source: Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `CharacterRangeEquality2` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 处理窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件并调用`CharacterRangeEquality2`方法从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理方法，并传递`e`作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position in the string of the first character of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.CharacterRange" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置字符串中此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.CharacterRange" /> 的第一个字符的位置。

trans-unit.source: The first position of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.CharacterRange" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.CharacterRange" /> 的第一个位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回此实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer that is the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 一个 32 位带符号整数，它是此实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of positions in this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.CharacterRange" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.CharacterRange" /> 中的位置数。

trans-unit.source: The number of positions in this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.CharacterRange" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.CharacterRange" /> 中的位置数。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.CharacterRange" /> to compare for equality.
trans-unit.target: 要比较等效性的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.CharacterRange" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.CharacterRange" /> to compare for equality.
trans-unit.target: 要比较等效性的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.CharacterRange" />。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.CharacterRange" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.CharacterRange" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.First" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.Length" /> values of the two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.CharacterRange" /> objects are equal.
trans-unit.target: 指示两个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.CharacterRange" /> 对象的 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.First" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.Length" /> 值是否相等的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate the two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.CharacterRange" /> objects have the same <see cref="P:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.First" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.Length" /> values; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.CharacterRange" /> 对象的 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.First" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.Length" /> 值均相同，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: You can also test for equality using the <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以测试相等性使用<xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.Equals%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是 <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.op_Equality%2A> operator.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.op_Equality%2A>运算符。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴到 Windows 窗体中。

trans-unit.source: Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `CharacterRangeEquality1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 处理窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件并调用`CharacterRangeEquality1`方法从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理方法，并传递`e`作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.CharacterRange" /> to compare for inequality.
trans-unit.target: 要比较不等性的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.CharacterRange" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.CharacterRange" /> to compare for inequality.
trans-unit.target: 要比较不等性的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.CharacterRange" />。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.CharacterRange" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.CharacterRange" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.First" /> or <see cref="P:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.Length" /> values of the two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.CharacterRange" /> objects are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 指示两个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.CharacterRange" /> 对象的 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.First" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.Length" /> 值是否不等的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate the either the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.First" /> or <see cref="P:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.Length" /> values of the two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.CharacterRange" /> objects differ; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.CharacterRange" /> 对象的 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.First" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.Length" /> 值中的任一个不同，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.op_Inequality%2A> method returns the opposite of the <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.op_Equality%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.op_Inequality%2A>方法返回的相反<xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.op_Equality%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是 <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.op_Inequality%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.op_Inequality%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴到 Windows 窗体中。

trans-unit.source: Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `CharacterRangeInequality` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 处理窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件并调用`CharacterRangeInequality`方法从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理方法，并传递`e`作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。
